data.eml:eml: Systematics and faunistics of Neotropical Eucosmini. 1. Chimoptesis Powell, 1964 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Razowski, Józef, Becker, Vitor Osmar (2015): Systematics and faunistics of Neotropical Eucosmini. 1. Chimoptesis Powell, 1964 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae). Zootaxa 3941 (2): 204-220, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.2.2
